ShowPresentationLanguageOption.title: Show presentation language option in options page
ShowPresentationLanguageOption.description: If set to true, the presentation language combobox will be available in the options page (defaults to false)

EnableGoogleAuthentication.title: Enable the google authentication method
EnableGoogleAuthentication.description: If set to true, the google authentication will be available as part of the login process

EnableMicrosoftAuthentication.title: Enable the microsoft authentication method
EnableMicrosoftAuthentication.description: If set to true, the microsoft authentication will be available as part of the login process

EnableCanvasAuthentication.title: Enable the canvas authentication method
EnableCanvasAuthentication.description: If set to true, the canvas authentication will be available as part of the login process

EnableSchoologyAuthentication.title: Enable the schoology authentication method
EnableSchoologyAuthentication.description: If set to true, the schoology authentication will be available as part of the login process
